Summary: 6 Orange Balls looked like fire balls
divs: Sighting DetailsAt 12 midnight in my back yard I looked up and saw 6 orange balls in the sky I thought they were planes but was wrong No sound 4 went south 2 stayed over my house for about 3 to 4 min than went south 2 slow and 1 fast then they were just gone and I see by the map on this site that the same thing was seen all ove the country.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Gig Harbor
There were no other sightings in Gig Harbor on or around December 31st 2011
